subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: New Jersey's own Greg Schiano has reintroduced big-time college football to the New York metropolitan area — or, as the Scarlet Knights coach likes to call it, the State of Rutgers.
snippet: New Jersey's own Greg Schiano has reintroduced big-time college football to the New York metropolitan area — or, as the Scarlet Knights coach likes to call it, the State of Rutgers.
